function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proximity of temporal distance and spatial distance in relation to COVID-19 increases psychological closeness and low construal, leading to a focus long-term solutions.","Mitigation":"Promote awareness of broader implications and long-term solutions to counteract the effect of psychological closeness.","Technologies":"Educational campaigns, information dissemination through media and online platforms.","People":"General public, especially in severely affected countries and regions.","Owner":"Health organizations, governments, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Fear of COVID-19 transmission to families and friends due to close social distance within the in-group, leading to protective measures and enforced quarantine measures.","Impact":"Risk of people prioritizing the safety of their in-group over others, potentially leading to neglect of broader community health measures.","Mitigation":"Promote collective responsibility and community health measures to counteract the focus on protecting only the in-group.","Technologies":"Community engagement programs, public health campaigns, social media communication.","People":"Individuals and families, particularly in regions with high COVID-19 prevalence.","Owner":"Community leaders, public health authorities, governments"},{"Description":"Mandatory quarantine measures leading to social isolation and potential mental health implications.","Impact":"Risk of increased social isolation and mental health periods.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps, virtual social platforms, online delivery services.","People":"Those under enforced quarantine, including the elderly and vulnerable populations.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals, community organizations"}]}
